fullText: Dan Lauria brings a bruising authenticity to his portrayal of the Green Bay Packers coach in this biographical play that runs more like a seminar than a drama.
dtliExcerpt: Dan Lauria brings a bruising authenticity to his portrayal of the Green Bay Packers coach in this biographical play that runs more like a seminar than a drama.
